Lesson 13 - WAP

Expected Work

  1. Finish your header
  2. Continue working on your HTML and LESS. Don't get overwhelmed with the amount of code, just reference the examples when you need to. Spend some time reading the external references.

Agile

  1. What did you since last session
  2. What do you want to achieve today
  3. Any problems?

Lecture

  1. Continue through the common UI examples
  2. Clearless Elements
  3. 43 days left!

Practice

  1. Continue working through common UI
  2. Try to get at least half of your main body done
  3. When creating a new component or element, try to do it yourself via normal HTML, then google around or check the demos/docs for any examples. It's most likely that someone else has already done it before!
